code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./DeleteDevice.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeleteDevice=()=>{const[deviceId,setDeviceId]=useState('');const[response,setResponse]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleDeleteDevice=async()=>{if(!deviceId.trim()){setResponse('Please enter a device ID.');return;}setLoading(true);setResponse('');try{const result=await axios.delete("http://localhost:5000/api/devices/".concat(deviceId));setResponse(result.data.message||'Device Deleted Successfully!');}catch(error){setResponse('Failed to Delete Device!');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"delete-device-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Delete Device"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter Device ID",value:deviceId,onChange:e=>setDeviceId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDeleteDevice,disabled:loading,children:loading?'Deleting...':'Delete Device'}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:response})]});};export default DeleteDevice;
